Metadata.title: CoderCrack | High-Impact Frontend Development
Metadata.description: We create fast, reliable web applications with an exceptional user experience that drive business growth.
Metadata.keywords: React Developer, frontend performance React, React web applications, Next.js developer, freelance developer

HomePage.hero_badge: Frontend Development with React.js and Next.js
HomePage.hero_subtitle: We create fast, reliable web applications with an exceptional user experience that drive your business growth.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.subtitle: Custom solutions to take your digital presence to the next level.

web_portfolio.title: Websites & Portfolios
web_portfolio.description: Professional online presence with high-performance static or dynamic sites.

landing_pages.title: High-Conversion Landing Pages
landing_pages.description: Landing pages optimized for speed and conversion in marketing campaigns.

web_apps.title: Web Applications (SPAs)
web_apps.description: Internal tools, dashboards, and admin panels with React and Next.js.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Improving speed, accessibility, and overall performance of existing websites.

migrations.title: Migrations & Refactoring
migrations.description: Updating slow sites to modern technologies like React and Next.js.

design_systems.title: UI Design Systems
design_systems.description: Reusable component libraries to standardize styles and accelerate development.

integrations.title: Complex Integrations
integrations.description: Connection with APIs, e-commerce, payment gateways, and authentication systems.

white_label.title: White Label Services
white_label.description: Collaboration and outsourcing of frontend development for digital agencies.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Support
maintenance.description: Incremental improvements, support, and post-delivery updates.

Projects.title: Featured Projects
Projects.subtitle: A showcase of our work and the impact we create.
Projects.project1_description: A data analytics platform for startups, with interactive visualizations and real-time performance.
Projects.project2_description: A high-conversion landing page for a new mobile app, achieving a 40% increase in downloads.
Projects.project3_description: Online store with a minimalist design, Stripe integration, and a smooth shopping experience.

Testimonials.title: What our clients say
Testimonials.testimonial1_quote: The CoderCrack team transformed our idea into a functional and scalable web application. Their expertise in React is unmatched.
Testimonials.testimonial2_quote: The new landing page has exceeded all our expectations. The loading speed is incredible, and conversions have skyrocketed.
Testimonials.testimonial3_quote: Working with them was a pleasure. They understood our vision perfectly and delivered a flawless and professional website.

AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.paragraph: I am a passionate frontend developer dedicated to building modern, intuitive, and high-performance user interfaces. With years of experience in the React ecosystem, I specialize in transforming complex ideas into digital realities.
AboutMe.feature1_text: Development of robust and SEO-optimized applications.
AboutMe.feature2_text: Close collaboration with designers to create memorable user experiences.
AboutMe.feature3_text: Obsessed with loading speed and frontend efficiency.

Contact.title: Ready to start your project?
Contact.subtitle: Contact me for a free consultation. Let's talk about how I can help you achieve your goals.

ContactForm.validation_name: Name must be at least 2 characters long.
ContactForm.validation_email: Please enter a valid email address.
ContactForm.validation_message: Message must be at least 10 characters long.
ContactForm.toast_success_description: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you soon.

PerformanceAudit.title: Free Performance Audit
PerformanceAudit.description: Enter your website's URL to get a detailed performance analysis, identifying bottlenecks and improvement opportunities.

LeadForm.subtitle: Complete these short steps so I can better understand your needs.

step1.title: What type of project do you have in mind?
step1.validation: You must select a project type.

step2.design_title: Do you have a UI/UX design already?

step3.validation_name: Name must be at least 2 characters long.
step3.validation_email: Please enter a valid email address.
step3.validation_message: Message must be at least 10 characters long.

LeadForm.submitted_description: I have received your request and will contact you within 24 hours to discuss your project.
